_header: O Albion of all lands to behold
_description: Metrical prophecy on England — in couplets

BodRawD1062.First Lines:
O Albeon of all landes to beholdto thinke of thy sorow it maketh me
                    could…
BodRawD1062.Last Lines:
…good men in England shall be mery & glad& the
                    þat be evill shal be very sory [ ]
